data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cleva, Régis (2008): Stylodactylidae and Bathypalaemonellidae (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea) from the PANGLAO 2004 and 2005 expeditions to the Philippines, with description of a new species of Stylodactylus A. Milne - Edwards, 1881. Zootaxa 1813: 29-41, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.182835
